pull.title: Let autoconf detect presence of EVP_MD_CTX_new

milestone.description: Milestone for Bitcoin Core 0.13.3 (used for branch maintenance and does not imply a release)

events.body: ACK. Sorry for braking it, I thought building on older OpenSSL is enough.
(Testing on older OpenSSL should have been enough IMO, but apparently LibreSSL claims to be OpenSSL 2.0 in its version macro :/)
utACK other than the one comment.

events.message:
Let autoconf detect presence of EVP_MD_CTX_new

Fixes LibreSSL compatibility

comments.body: Pretty sure this needs CRYPTO_CFLAGS too, to be on the safe side.
